dialogue: I invented a device that can detect losers.
How do I know it's accurate?
Point it at a known loser and see if it pings.
Hey! It knows Ted is a loser!
Ha ha ha!!! It says Dilbert and Alice are losers too!
And Carol and Wally too! Ha ha ha!!! This thing is totally accurate!
How exactly does it detect losers?
They're the ones who hold it backward.
